ref.div: Hastings DA, Dunbar PK, Elphingstone GM, Bootz M, Murakami H, Maruyama H, Masaharu H, Holland P, Payne J, Bryant NA, Logan TL, Muller J-P, Schreier G, MacDonald JS (1999) The Global Land One-kilometer Base Elevation (GLOBE) Digital Elevation Model, Version 1.0. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration National Geophysical Data Center U.S.A. Digital data base on the World Wide Web http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/topo/globe.html and CD-ROMs. Accessed 10 Aug 2017
